channel.title: Kubuntu Installing?
channel.description: Alright im using the terminal and the command kdesudo apt-get install rpm so that i can install nerolinux on kubuntu. Well after i use that command i get to the part where it asks for yes or no. I type Y, hit enter, and nothing happens. Anyone know why it does that?

item.title: Kubuntu Installing?
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

^Wrong

On the command line, just use sudo, not kdesu. Also bowserjr2 meant ‘Adept Manager’, not ‘Apt-Get’.

Read full topic

item.title: Kubuntu Installing?
item.dc:creator: @bowserjr2 Bowser jr
item.description:
@bowserjr2 wrote:

Click on “start” button.
Then System.
Adept Manager.
And find what you need there.

▼ Right.

Read full topic

item.title: Kubuntu Installing?
item.dc:creator: @billygotshot billygotshot
item.description:
@billygotshot wrote:

Alright im using the terminal and the command kdesudo apt-get install rpm so that i can install nerolinux on kubuntu. Well after i use that command i get to the part where it asks for yes or no. I type Y, hit enter, and nothing happens. Anyone know why it does that?
